attributes.action: Stop the EU Kill List of Invasive Species
attributes.background: To stop the EU culling of defenceless animals.  Why should countries in the EU now have to eradicate animals which have been here for a number of years through no fault of their own.  I enjoy feeding the squirrels in St James' Park and seeing Muntjac Deer whilst out walking in my local area.

rejection.details:
This is not something that the UK Government or Parliament could achieve on their own.

You could start a petition calling on the UK Government to work with other EU member states to change EU law on invasive species, or to take a specific action in the UK. 

Alternatively, the European Parliament has its own petitions process. You can find out more here:

http://www.europarl.europa.eu/atyourservice/en/20150201PVL00037/Petitions
